headline: Rio 2016 Olympics: Day 15 as it happened
content: By Sophie Eastaugh and Matias Grez, CNNUpdated 0343 GMT (1143 HKT) August 21, 2016  (CNN)On the penultimate day of action at Rio 2016, Mo Farah became only the second man in history to defend the "Double-Double" over 5,000 and 10,000 meters (2153).
